Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Smart Hotel places you in the heart of Rome, walking distance from Diocletian Bath and Octagonal Hall. This 4-star hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 64 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 1 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and an elevator (lift).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 1 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 64 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected.

A stay at Smart Hotel places you in the heart of Rome, walking distance from Diocletian Bath and Octagonal Hall. This 4-star hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Diocletian Bath - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Maria degli Angeli - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Central Library of Rome - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Porta Pia - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Umberto I Policlinic of Rome - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza Fiume - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Santa Prassede - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Museum of Contemporary Art of Rome - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 24 km / 14.9 mi

The preferred airport for Smart Hotel is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
